pdbeccdutils.extensions¶

pdbeccdutils.extensions.collection_ext.find_element_in_list(array, element)¶

Finds an element in an array. Does not crash if not found

Parameters:
  • array (list) – list to be searched
  • element (any) – element to be found
Returns:

Index of the element or None if the element is not found.
Return type:

int
pdbeccdutils.extensions.drawing.save_no_image(path_to_image, width=200)¶

Generate pretty image with ‘No image available’ message in case the 2D depiction cannot be created.

Parameters:
  • path_to_image (str) – path to the image
  • width (int, optional) – Defaults to 200. width of the image
pdbeccdutils.extensions.drawing.supply_font()¶

Platform non-specific function to locate sans-serif font in the environment.

Returns:path to the font
Return type:str
pdbeccdutils.extensions.str_conversions.str_is_int(i)¶

Check if str can be converted to int

Parameters:i (str) – string representation of an integer
Returns:[description]
Return type:bool
pdbeccdutils.extensions.str_conversions.str_to_float(f)¶

Converts the string into float

Parameters:i (str) – string representation of a float
Returns:conversion of the string
Return type:float
pdbeccdutils.extensions.str_conversions.str_to_int(i)¶

Converts the string into integer

Parameters:i (str) – string representation of an integer
